Item.Value: Welcome to the Adventurer's Guild. I'm $0$, guildmaster here. It's good to see a new face in town. You can hire adventurers here, as long as you have housing for them as well as send them on missions.
Really? For me? You shouldn't have! Well, I'll keep this in mind next time we go out and exploring.
Greetings! What can I do for you today, &^&? [Talk:Talk|Hire Adventurers:BuyWorkers|Sell Contract:SellWorkers|See Missions:Missions|Never Mind:Cancel]
